overview: Meet Alex, a beautiful ambitious woman, who has just inherited her grandmother's famous family recipe for muffins. Inheriting muffins doesn't sound very exciting does it? These are no ordinary muffins though...these are muffins with a little something 'extra' added, an aphrodisiac. One bite of these love muffins and almost instantly connoisseurs become uncontrollably horny. So, along with the help of gal pal Luci, Alex decides to market the muffins, which become an overnight success. Who would have thought that muffins could cause such a commotion? Love muffins: one bite is never enough.
title: Love Muffins
